verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H7911>forget<s%> not my <S%H8451>law<s%>; but let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>:
For <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%>, and <S%H8141>long<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%>, and <S%H7965>peace<s%>, shall they add to <S%H3254>you<s%>.

Let not <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H7194>you<s%>: bind them about your <S%H1621>neck<s%>; <S%H3789>write<s%> them upon the <S%H3871>table<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart<s%>:
So shall you <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7922>understanding<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H120>man<s%>.
<S%H982>Trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with all your <S%H3820>heart<s%>; and <S%H8172>lean<s%> not unto your own <S%H998>understanding<s%>.
In all your <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> <S%H3474>him<s%>, and he shall direct your <S%H734>paths<s%>.
Be not <S%H2450>wise<s%> in your own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
It shall be <S%H7500>health<s%> to your <S%H8270>navel<s%>, and <S%H8250>marrow<s%> to your <S%H6106>bones<s%>.
<S%H3513>Honor<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with your <S%H1952>substance<s%>, and with the <S%H7225>firstfruits<s%> of all your <S%H8393>increase<s%>:
So shall your <S%H618>barns<s%> be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7647>plenty<s%>, and your <S%H3342>presses<s%> shall burst <S%H6555>out<s%> with new <S%H8492>wine<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3988>despise<s%> not the <S%H4148>chastening<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; neither be <S%H6973>weary<s%> of his <S%H8433>correction<s%>:
For whom the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> he <S%H3198>corrects<s%>; even as a <S%H1>father<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> in whom he <S%H7521>delights<s%>.
<S%H835>Happy<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H4672>finds<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and the <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H6329>gets<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%>.
For the <S%H5504>merchandise<s%> of it is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H5505>merchandise<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H8393>gain<s%> there than fine <S%H2742>gold<s%>.
She is more <S%H3368>precious<s%> than <S%H6443>rubies<s%>: and all the things you can <S%H2656>desire<s%> are not to be compared unto <S%H7737>her<s%>.
<S%H753>Length<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> is in her right <S%H3225>hand<s%>; and in her left <S%H8040>hand<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H3519>honor<s%>.
Her <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H5278>pleasantness<s%>, and all her <S%H5410>paths<s%> are <S%H7965>peace<s%>.
She is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> to them that lay <S%H2388>hold<s%> upon <S%H833>her<s%>: and happy is every one that retaineth <S%H8551>her<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> has <S%H3245>founded<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>; by <S%H8394>understanding<s%> has he <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.
By his <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> the <S%H8415>depths<s%> are broken <S%H1234>up<s%>, and the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> drop <S%H7491>down<s%> the <S%H2919>dew<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, let not them <S%H3868>depart<s%> from your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: <S%H5341>keep<s%> sound <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4209>discretion<s%>:
So shall they be <S%H2416>life<s%> unto your <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and <S%H2580>grace<s%> to your <S%H1621>neck<s%>.
Then shall you <S%H3212>walk<s%> in your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%>, and your <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall not <S%H5062>stumble<s%>.
When you lie <S%H7901>down<s%>, you shall not be <S%H6342>afraid<s%>: <S%H7901>Yes<s%>, you shall lie down, and your <S%H8142>sleep<s%> shall be <S%H6149>sweet<s%>.
Be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H6597>sudden<s%> <S%H6343>fear<s%>, neither of the <S%H7722>desolation<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, when it <S%H935>comes<s%>.
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall be your <S%H3689>confidence<s%>, and shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H7272>foot<s%> from being <S%H3921>taken<s%>.
<S%H4513>Withhold<s%> not <S%H2896>good<s%> from them to whom it is <S%H1167>due<s%>, when it is in the <S%H410>power<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to do <S%H6213>it<s%>.
<S%H559>Say<s%> not unto your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, and come <S%H7725>again<s%>, and to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%>; when you have it by <S%H3426>you<s%>.
<S%H2790>Devise<s%> not <S%H7451>evil<s%> against your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, seeing he <S%H3427>dwells<s%> securely by <S%H983>you<s%>.
<S%H7378>Argue<s%> not with a <S%H120>man<s%> without <S%H2600>cause<s%>, if he has <S%H1580>done<s%> you no <S%H7451>harm<s%>.
<S%H7065>Envy<s%> you not the <S%H376>oppressor<s%>, and <S%H977>choose<s%> none of his <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
For the <S%H3868>perverse<s%> is <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: but his <S%H5475>secret<s%> is with the <S%H3477>righteous<s%>.
The <S%H3994>curse<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>: but he <S%H1288>blesses<s%> the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%>.
Surely he <S%H3887>scorns<s%> the <S%H3887>scorners<s%>: but he <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> unto the <S%H6035>lowly<s%>.
The <S%H2450>wise<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%>: but <S%H7036>shame<s%> shall be the <S%H7311>promotion<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%>.
